Name: Romanesco Cabbage
SeedDescription: Plant them in fall or winter. Take 14 days to produce.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 가을 또는 겨울에 심는다. 꽃이 피는데 14일 걸린다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Sähen im Herbst oder Winter. Es brauch 14 Tage Zeit, um zu produzieren.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter en automne ou hiver. Il faudra 14 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте осенью или зимой. Вырастает через 14 дней.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 在秋天或者冬天种植，需要14天成熟
